S.FORM: Ernie Barrett nalecuhan i Pratt, Kansas, nanu syubay kanas mali miunduay nu Amilika NBA nisakaput, pahanhanan tu kawaw ayza. Ernie Barrett i 1951 a mihcan NBA sapapili' mimaliay a kawaw, saka 1 ku uwac atu silsil 7, namapili' tu nu Boston Celtics putiput. 8 bulad 27 demiad, 1929 a mihca, Ernie Barrett, miunduay. namakayniay a nasulitan nasakamuan atu natinengan Lists of National Basketball Association players
